I started a set then decided it wasn't for me. PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], if interested.

Thanks, Steven

Will part with the entire group for $800

I also have a John Henry raw I'm willing to sell as well. He's a little higher priced at $1100. I'll toss him in the full group for $1600.

Art Fletcher - SGC 40 - $100
Lee Magee SP -SGC 10 - $650
Rube Marquard - PSA 1 - $225
Rube Oldring - SGC 30 - $90
